name: .VBI File Extension
summary: Learn about .VBI files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open VBI files with Vectras VM on an Android device using its ROM Manager, which provides tools for importing and managing custom virtual machines. When you select a VBI file in the app, Vectras VM automatically sets up the virtual machine using default settings, or you can customize the configuration.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
